editing.name: Manuscript Assessment
editing.description: Read-through for fiction or non-fiction. 45-minute in-person or Zoom discussion, 3-5 page written report on structure, manuscript goals, narrative arc, language, etc.

editing.name: Developmental Editing
editing.description: Manuscript assessment, plus consultation on remedies for issues found.

editing.name: Line Editing
editing.description: Page-by-page editing for language, style, and consistency.

editing.name: Proofreading
editing.description: Checking the final manuscript for grammatical, typographical and formatting errors.

otherservices.name: Publishing Consultation
otherservices.description: Half-hour free discussion to determine goals and status of manuscript. If engaged, we shepherd your manuscript through editorial, design, and print-and-bind, offering options for press or digital publishing.

otherservices.name: Subsidy Publishing
otherservices.description: using our ISBN and services, we turn your manuscript into a finished book. Fees negotiated based on length of manuscript and services chosen. Includes editorial, design, and print-and-bind. We use IngramSpark to create your book the way you want it.
